title: Cardinal - Your AI product backlog
content: We use essential cookies to make our site work. With your consent, we may also use non-essential cookies to improve user experience and analyze website traffic. By clicking “Accept,” you agree to our website's cookie use as described in our Cookie Policy. You can change your cookie settings at any time by clicking “Preferences.”
textContent: We use essential cookies to make our site work. With your consent, we may also use non-essential cookies to improve user experience and analyze website traffic. By clicking “Accept,” you agree to our website's cookie use as described in our Cookie Policy. You can change your cookie settings at any time by clicking “Preferences.”
excerpt: Cardinal is an opinionated feature backlog. It pulls in your customer feedback, calls, CRM data, and task management tickets and uses AI to assess which customers want which features, how important is it for them, and tie them to your product strategy.
